publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2002.3 Karen Gillon: Common Agricultural Policy Health Check—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2002) in the name of Richard Lochhead, leave out from "with farmers" to end and insert "playing its full part in ensuring the long-term viability of our rural communities and enabling farmers to play their part in achieving the Scottish Government’s purpose of sustainable economic growth through food production, high standards of animal welfare and the environmental management of our agricultural land."
